/weather clear
Skies are clear in Anchorage, AK 
/weather clear
A hurricane is hitting Jacksonville, FL
/weather2 storm create f1
Skies are clear here in Bethlehem, PA
/weather2 storm killall
/weather clear
There is a 50% chance of rain with scattered thunderstorms in Honolulu, HI
/weather2 storm create rain
/weather2 storm create thunder
/weather2 storm killall
Its hailing in Ann Arbor, MI
/weather2 storm create hail
Skies are clear in Seattle, WA
/weather2 storm killall
/weather clear
Theres a sandstorm in Mojave Desert, CA
/weather 2 storm create sandstorm
Skies are clear in Bismarck, ND
/weather2 storm killall
/weather clear
Its snowing in Rapid City, SD
/weather clear
/weather rain
Theres a waterspout in San Juan, PR
/weather2 storm killall
/weather2 storm create spout
Skies are clear in Mobile, AL
/weather2 storm killall
/weather clear
